channel.title: Mods mods mods!
channel.description: What is the best Half Life or Half Life: Source mod available? I am about to replay Half Life for the umpteenth time and looking for a way to make it look as realistic as possible with out changing any game play. I don't care about opinions about how those kind of mods ruin the game I'm just looking for the the best looking mod available. Any suggestions?

item.title: Mods mods mods!
item.dc:creator: Ch00_z_3r
item.description:
I recommend Ultimate Definition over Enhanced. So many times have I attempted to use the Paranoia mp5 in that mod only to have missing hgrunt textures no matter what I tried.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods mods mods!
item.dc:creator: Drakey83
item.description:
I tried about 10 Google searches before I made this thread but for some reason I had convinced myself that the mod was named ultra something or other. I tried about 4 “ultra” mods before giving up and making this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods mods mods!
item.dc:creator: deadbubble
item.description:
Drakey83:

I’m about to install the first one. I was actually looking for that one, I installed it a while ago, but for the life of me I couldn’t remember what it was called. I was going to just look for a new one but since you suggested the one I was looking for in the first place I am just going to re-install that. Once again THANKS A LOT!

You welcome! I actually found it through the comments on the second one on ModDB. Someone said that one was better, and gave it a quick look, then forgot about it. I saw this thread, and decided my best to look for it. Eventually, after many tries, I just typed something that sounded about right, and I was!

Read full topic

item.title: Mods mods mods!
item.dc:creator: deadbubble
item.description:
Drakey83:

Thanks a lot!

You welcome! Out of curiosity, which one did you go for?

Read full topic

item.title: Mods mods mods!
item.dc:creator: deadbubble
item.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R6Gtq6hgzoc
That one seems good.

https://gamebanana.com/hls/skins/screens/118256?screen=8
Link for download. It’s a skin pack, apparently. It’s a re-upload, with some edits, like the ENBSeries shaders, I guess.

There’s always this if you want an actual mod.
https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-source-enhanced/page/4#comments

For Goldsrc Version: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-redux-v2/page/4#comments

EDIT: Actually, I just remembered something about Redux. The tram always seem to not move after a point, leaving you stuck. You can always skip it through console.

https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-gold
Also, that one seems to look better to me. But it has some less extra features, such as real-time shadows from your flashlight.

Read full topic
